wikitext.*:
{{ardayearheader|2754|2757|2758|2759|2760|2763|2767}}

* The [[Long Winter]] ends. Great suffering and loss of life in [[Eriador]] and [[Rohan]].<ref name="TA"/><ref name="Mark"/>
* The [[Days of Dearth]], a dreadful famine in [[The Shire]], continues.<ref>{{FR|Hobbits}}</ref>
* Death of [[Thain]] [[Isumbras Took III]]<ref name="Took">{{App|Took}}</ref>
* [[Ferumbras Took II]], son of Isumbras Took III, becomes the twenty-fourth Thain of [[the Shire]].<ref name="Took"/>
* [[Wulf's rebellion]]: Death of [[Kings of Rohan|King]] [[Helm|Helm Hammerhand]] of [[Rohan]].<ref name="Mark">{{App|Mark}}</ref>
* [[Corsair wars]]: Before spring, Captain [[Beregond (Steward of Gondor)|Beregond]] repels the invading [[Corsairs]], then sends reinforcements to Rohan.<ref>{{App|Stewards}}</ref>
* [[Fréaláf]], nephew of King Helm, slays [[Wulf]] and becomes the tenth king,<ref name="Mark"/> starting the second line of [[Kings of Rohan|Kings of the Mark]].<ref name="TA">{{App|TA}}</ref> 
* [[Saruman]] takes up his abode in [[Isengard]] with the permission of [[Beren (Steward of Gondor)|Beren]].<ref name="TA"/>
{{references}}
[[Category:Third Age years|2, Third Age 2759]]
